pageTitle: Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Sunday, October 24, 2021 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

10:15 p.m. The Prime Minister will deliver a pre-recorded keynote address during the ASEAN Business and Investment Summit (ABIS) 2021, hosted by Brunei.

Viewers can register to watch the event via the following link: https://hopin.com/events/asean-business-investment-summit-2021-2313d48c-4baa-408a-b991-0c38ea868157/registration.
